description: Try our easy to follow King Prawns With Japanese Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: King Prawns With Japanese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toss together the bean sprouts, snowpeas, water chestnuts, lettuce and radishes and scatter over the prawns and sesame seeds. Drizzle over the dressing and serve immediately.
